abstract: The videos, which Mr. Newsome composed in collaboration with musicians, will be on view at the Marlborough Gallery in Chelsea, where Mr. Newsome's show runs, through Dec. 3. Or you can watch them exclusively here.
snippet: The videos, which Mr. Newsome composed in collaboration with musicians, will be on view at the Marlborough Gallery in Chelsea, where Mr. Newsome's show runs, through Dec. 3. Or you can watch them exclusively here.
lead_paragraph: For his debut solo exhibition at the Marlborough Gallery in Chelsea, "Herald," the artist Rashaad Newsome didn't stop with framed works. Mr. Newsome, 31, a multimedia artist whose work blends contemporary hip-hop culture with the rules and designs of centuries-old heraldry, created a series of music videos - his contemporary coats of arms come to life.

headline.main: 'Swag the Mix Tape,' Exclusive Video From Rashaad Newsome
